(TY KSLawdogg.)

::Shadow Wing::

She turned the corner and ran onto the bridge just as the bomb went 
off.  She was thrown back across the hall and hit the wall with full 
force from the explosion.  She falls to the floor covered in shrapnel 
cuts. She coughs and gets up on her knees, recovering from the 
explosion.
